Respondents were participants of the mobile pulmonary screening of the Hungarian Maltese Relief Service (primarily homeless persons, and to a very little extent - appr. 3% - home owner elderly poor pensioners). A note about representativity: since the respondents belong to a hidden population, the usual sampling processes could not be used for want of a sampling frame.
